pr_title: Support bulk indexing through test client in integration tests.

timeline.message:
Support bulk indexing through test client in integration tests.

This change adds a `bulkIndex` functionality to the ES test client,
which allows tests to bulk index fixtures in a driver-agnostic way (the
`Client` class will prospectively be turned into an interface implemented by
each driver).

timeline.author: alex-konn

replies.bodyText: This will be done in a subsequent PR to avoid otherwise necessary rebasing and merging.
replies.author: alex-konn
